<!-- ### About our lab -->

<center><img src="groupPic3_edited.jpeg" width="80%"></center>

<br>

Our lab lives in the [Environmental Health Sciences](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/academics/departments/environmental-health-sciences-ehs) Department at [Columbia University's](https://www.columbia.edu/) [Mailman School of Public Health](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/). <br>
Our research focuses on methodological issues in environmental epidemiology.
